description:
Becaz is a cryptocurrency which is related to time with blockchain infrastructure and uses the time as payment and investment asset.

We developed a proof of time concept to convert time to money. By this concept with Becaz, people can earn a fair amount of money based on their success and skills over a certain period of time.

Becaz is about to reduce the unfair distribution of income among the people who do the same job. Moreover, it tackles to decrease brain drain, poverty and ignorance. Precisely for this, we created a peer-to-peer online learning platform which is becaz.com.

By the help of this platform becaz coins can be mined by knowledge and distributed to all the skilled people.

Time as payment and investment asset
Tackles to decrease brain drain, poverty and ignorance
Mining can be done by knowledge
name: Becaz
